pages.title: Nether Catalyst
pages.text: A catalyst extracted from the soul of the mobs that roam the Nether. List of valid mobs: Blazes, Ghasts, Hoglins, Magma Cubes, Piglins, Striders, Wither Skeletons, Zoglins and Zombified Piglins.
Complete the Catalyst by absorbing the correct souls, until the process is finished and the Catalyst appears.

When used in a Runic Artifact, a Nether Catalyst produces Nether Materia. Nether Materia can be consumed for experience or transformed into Blaze Rods, Coal, Glowstone Dust, Ghast Tears, Gold Ingots or Magma Cream.
